channel.title: How do i get 508 to work?
channel.description: i followed stormcutter's guide on how to make a 508, so i followed his tut, i got the chache508 in the C:, i dled cache, and the 2 other things in the tut, i opened my source, then i opened the 508, it said..."error_game_js5connect" can some 1 please help?

item.title: How do i get 508 to work?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“noob bow, post:9, topic:247920”]i got this error:

Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.Runtime Exception [/quote]

Your cache has been place incorrectly.

[size=6pt]I believe.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get 508 to work?
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[quote=“Jpark, post:6, topic:247920”]didnt work :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 09:37:26 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Goodoo dolls link=topic=326930.msg2560371#msg2560371 date=1228099931]
Open client.java in you client in the files folder go to the very bottom and i mean the bottom and change 127 to ur no-ip or local ip (eg. 192.168.2.100)
[/quote]
so change 127 to my server?[/quote]

Yes.
